name: Micro Kingdoms Alpha
description:
A proof of concept idle defence game hybrid. Defend your wall from the encroaching red horde while you build up an economy. £1 for the source files for any use (Game maker 2)

Future things, if I work on his later:

  • create and deploy campaign army
  • different enemy types
  • more ammo options
  • more defender units
  • just more stuff everywhere

Any suggestions would be welcome, or just tell me if you have played the game and liked or disliked it!
